00013 class Log{
00014     public:
00016         void log(std::string message) {
00017 #           ifdef DEBUG
00018                 std::cerr << message << std::endl;
00019 #           endif
00020         }
00021 
00023         Log &operator<<(const std::string &message) {
00024 #           ifdef DEBUG
00025                 std::cerr << message;
00026 #           endif
00027             return *this;
00028         }
00029 
00031         Log &operator<<(long x) {
00032             return operator<<(Globals::Instance().itoa(x));
00033         }
00034 
00036         Log &operator<<(unsigned long x) {
00037             return operator<<(Globals::Instance().itoa(x));
00038         }
00039 
00041         Log &operator<<(double x) {
00042             return operator<<(Globals::Instance().ftoa(x));
00043         }
00044 
00045     private:
00047         Log() { }
00049         Log(const Log &);
00051         Log &operator=(const Log &);
00053         ~Log() { }
00054

00056 };
